author: jcompagner
msg: always call setModelObject on updatemodel wil the collection or list that was updated.
This is for object that do some post processing with that List (The list is not directly a list of a database object or something like that, 1-n relation)
For normal use  with database object the same reference is just set.

author: jdonnerstag
msg: fixed [1312787 ] Image inside border doesn't work

fixed resolution of images inside a border. The image will now be resolved with the associated markup and not the border. Thus we keep previewability and the possibility of packing a re-usable component without the necassity to copy the image into wicket.markup.html.border which is somewhat strange.

author: jdonnerstag
msg: allways provide a means to access the original (web) response object, even if the response has temporarily being replaced by e.g. a StringResponse.
